posts.content: I saw Dylan in LA in 2016. You could hardly hear him. After he sang 'Tangled Up in Blue,' an audience member shouted 'Play 'Tangled Up in Blue!''
Finally was able to see Dylan in Philadelphia at the end of 2021. The man was 80 years old and could hardly stand up straight. But he still knows how to work the crowd! Favorite concert ever!
Had the honor to see the man in the 60's. He as hours late but no one complained.
Dylan walked by me once in the airport. Forgot to get on my flight after that...
My father played Dylan through my childhood. Always made me happy.

songs.title: It's All Over Now, Baby Blue
